import sys

def base(n):
	max=0
	while(n!=0):
		if(n%10 > max):
			max=n%10
			
		n=n/10
	return max+1

def convert(n,b):
	i=0
	sum=0
	while(n!=0):
		sum+=(n%10)*pow(b,i)
		i=i+1
		n=n/10
	
	return sum

def main():
	t=int(raw_input())
	
	while(t!=0):
		a,b=map(int,raw_input().split())
		a=convert(a,base(a))
		b=convert(b,base(b))
		print a+b
		t=t-1
if __name__ == '__main__':
	main()
